question: Clarence Thomas impeached?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Clarence Thomas is formally impeached by the U.S. House of Representatives by 11:59 PM ET on August 31, 2024. Impeachment is defined as the House passing articles of impeachment with a majority vote against the sitting Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas.

If Thomas is not impeached by the specified date and time, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be official announcements from the U.S. House of Representatives or a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Biden COVID free by next Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden or one of his representatives publicly confirms that Biden is free of an active COVID-19 infection by 11:59 PM ET on July 26, 2024. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”. 

Statements that Biden has tested negative for COVID-19 or that he has fully recovered from his COVID-19 infection will qualify for a “Yes” resolution. 

The resolution source will be public statements from Biden or one of his representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Biden COVID free by next Friday?

question: Biden announcement on future today?
description:
On July 18, The Hill reported that Democratic Party insiders expect President Biden to make a major announcement about his future soon (see: https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign/4780762-biden-future-harris-running-mate/). 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if President Joe Biden makes any major announcement regarding his future, such as his decision to resign the presidency or whether to run or not run for re-election, by 11:59 PM ET on July 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No”.

Only official statements from the White House or Biden himself will qualify for a “Yes” resolution. Unofficial statements from staff, will not qualify.

The resolution source for this market is official statements from Biden or one of his representatives.

question: CrowdStrike outage fixed by Friday night?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the IT outages linked to CrowdStrike, are resolved by 11:59 PM ET on July 19, 2024. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution will be based on official statements from CrowdStrike or a consensus of credible reporting indicating that the affected services are mostly operational, with only minor issues remaining.

events.title: CrowdStrike outage fixed by Friday night?

question: CrowdStrike outage fixed by Noon?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the IT outages linked to CrowdStrike, are resolved by 12:00 PM ET on July 19, 2024. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution will be based on official statements from CrowdStrike or a consensus of credible reporting indicating that the affected services are mostly operational, with only minor issues remaining.

question: Will American Airlines be ungrounded by Noon?
description:
On the morning July 19, 2024, the FAA grounded all flights from Delta, United, and American Airlines due to a communication issue (see https://www.cnn.com/2024/07/19/business/delta-american-airlines-flights-outage-intl-hnk/index.html):

This market will resolve to "Yes" if American Airlines is ungrounded and resumes flight operations within the continental United States by 12:00 PM ET on July 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution will be based on official statements from the FAA or American Airlines, or a consensus of credible reporting indicating that American Airlines has been permitted to operate takeoffs for commercial passenger flights within the continental US.

events.title: Will American Airlines be ungrounded by Noon?

question: CrowdStrike caused by a hack?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if it is discovered that the July 19 CrowdStrike outage was caused by a hack by July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

"A hack" encompasses intentional, malicious activity which caused the outage.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements from the U.S. Government and CrowdStrike. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used to resolve this market.

question: UFC Fight Night: Who will win - Lemos vs. Jandiroba
description:
This is a market group about UFC Fight Night, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on July 20, 2024, at the UFC Apex in Las Vegas, Nevada.

This is a market on whether Amanda Lemos or Virna Jandiroba will win their bout.

If Amanda Lemos is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Lemos”. If Virna Jandiroba is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Jandiroba”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after July 27, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Elon tweet less than 60 times?
description:
If Elon Musk (@elonmusk), posts less less than 60 times on X between July 19, 2024, 12:00 PM ET (noon) and July 26, 2024, 12:00 PM ET this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, only main feed posts, quote posts and reposts posts will count.

Replies will NOT count towards the total - however, replies on the main feed such as https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1786073478711353576 will be counted by the tracker.

Deleted posts will count as long as they remain available long enough to be captured by the tracker (~5 minutes).

The resolution source for this market is the ‘Post Counter’ figure for posts found at https://www.xtracker.io/. Individual posts can be viewed by clicking "Export Data". If the tracker does not update correctly in accordance with the rules, X itself may be used as a secondary resolution source.

question: Will the Democratic ticket be all male?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Democratic ticket for the 2024 U.S. presidential election consists of a male presidential nominee and a male vice-presidential nominee. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democratic Party sources, including https://www.democrats.org. Any replacement of the nominees before election day will not change the resolution of the market.

events.title: Gender of the Democratic ticket?
events.description: This is a market on predicting the gender of the Democratic ticket for the upcoming election.
